import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import { FaArrowRight, FaArrowLeft } from "react-icons/fa"; // For carousel navigation const LandingPage = ({ mode, setMode }) => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const slides = [ { title: "Track Income & Expenses", description: "Manage your financial inflows and outflows with ease." }, { title: "Set Budgets", description: "Create and stick to budgets for better financial control." }, { title: "Visual Reports", description: "Gain insights with visual reports on spending and savings." }, ]; const handleNext = () => { setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % slides.length); }; const handlePrev = () => { setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length); }; return (
{/* Navigation */} {/* Hero Section */}

Track and Manage Your Finances with Ease

Our app helps you track income, expenses, savings, and much more. Take control of your financial future today!

{/* Carousel Section */}

Key Features

{slides[currentSlide].title}

{slides[currentSlide].description}

{/* Animated Image Section */}

Our App in Action

{/* Features Section */}

Key Features

Budget Creation

Set budgets for different categories and get alerts for overspending.

Expense Categorization

Automatically categorize your expenses and track where your money goes.

Visual Reports

Get visual insights into your spending habits with monthly and yearly reports.

Bank Sync

Integrate with your bank to automatically fetch and categorize transactions.

Tax Calculations

Estimate taxes and set reminders for filing dates.

Secure Login

Keep your data safe with secure login and authentication.

{/* Footer */}

© 2025 Personal Finance Tracker. All rights reserved.

); }; export default LandingPage;
